author: Simon Difford
description: Recipe supplied by Patrón, who say, "Patrón Silver is the perfect canvas for bartender Adrian Martinez’ passion fruit and chipotle pairing that makes the Margarita Caliente come alive. This Margarita of the Year creation also introduces a bit of sweetness from orange marmalade to keep things interesting."
name: Margarita Caliente

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass with a large ice cube
